4316310.name: Mushi Demo
4316310.description:
Mushi is a feature-packed incremental idle game. From the creators of Tower Walker this is a successor to improving the Auto-RPG formula and stepping out of the tower to explore the rich fantasy world of Aldora.

Create your character and begin your rise from level 1. Battle enemies with the automatic realtime combat using Melee, Ranged and Magic skills inspired by oldschool RPGs. Level up. Loot equipment. Defeat powerful bosses. Make impactful decisions. Train new skills. Grow stronger. Progress in the world zones. Craft. Upgrade and Enchant the loot. Reach the endgame and test your character in Normal/Heroic/Brutal mode raid dungeons.

This is the ultimate idle RPG experience unlike any other.

Features

  • Level up your character and learn new skills at the trainer

  • Loot weapons, armor, rings, artifacts and other powerful items

  • Progress in a zone-based rich fantasy world, explore and discover

  • Defeat powerful bosses to earn special unique items and rewards

  • Complete quests to discover lore and other hidden secrets

  • Trade with merchants in the basecamp or unlock secret vendors

  • Craft items, fully featured recipe based crafting system

  • Learn professions such as alchemy, blacksmithing, fishing, herbalism, cooking and more

  • Find and level up pets and companions with extra buffs and combat abilities

  • Reach the late-game and progress in raid dungeons to earn legendary items
